import react,{useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import {NavLink} from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' const MyData = ()=>{ const [username,setUsername] = useState("") const [userSeacrchedData,setUserSearchedData] = useState({}) useEffect(()=>{ setUsername("zadfab") getData() return( console.clear() ) },[]) useEffect(()=>{ getData() },[username]) const getData = async()=>{ const userData = await axios( { method: 'GET', url:`https://api.github.com/users/${username}`, } ).then((response)=>{ setUserSearchedData(response.data) console.log(response) }).catch((error)=>{ console.log(error) }) } return ( <>

Search your user name

Go Back
{return(setUsername(e.target.value))}}/>

Name

{userSeacrchedData.name}

Location

{userSeacrchedData.location}

Date Joined

{userSeacrchedData.created_at}

Email

{userSeacrchedData.email??"No email "}

Location

{userSeacrchedData.location}

) } export default MyData
